name: Twisty Balls Smasher
description:
Simple Fun Ball Smashing game, Play your tricks and complete all levels and compete with your friends!

You Just need to tap on screen to shoot the ball to get it pass through the twisty balls and get it smashed!

How many levels you can finish ? out of 1200 Levels!

Awesome Gameplay to have fun and relax your mind!

Please download today and give us review to show your love and feedback! Would love to hear from you!

Thanks for your support!
